intro: Haitia pulchra, commonly known as the beautiful haitia, is a flowering plant native to the Caribbean region. It belongs to the family Malvaceae, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its vibrant, showy flowers that bloom in shades of pink and white. Haitia pulchra typically grows in coastal areas and is adapted to sandy soils. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes.
